samples.question: Do you think that that is the best stage to leave home?
samples.transcript: I think it is the best age because on the other hand, I think it is also acceptable to leave home a bit later in life because it is better to stay with your family members to help each other and renting is too expensive if you cannot afford your own place. So now her answers are getting kind of short. I see so many opportunities to extend more here. and she is just kind of stating a position and then justifying it with because, but then not really taking it far enough to necessitate more complex or precise language. She is also starting to incorporate parts of the question a little too much. it is not wrong to do this, but it is not really helping either. Watch this.

samples.question: Are there any problems that can happen when families live together?
samples.transcript: I think the oldest member of the family, in fact needs some help because, their physical capacities are not that great. samples.question: In the future, do you think people will choose to rent rather than buy property?
samples.transcript: I think considering the rising housing costs, it is harder now to buy your own place, especially a big house. So, and a lot of young people prefer living close to the shops and public transport. So I think it is definitely a rising trend for people to rent, near the city center instead of buying their own place. One thing Vivian could have done here is reflect on her own feelings about this. Maybe she thinks it is kind of unfortunate that people are choosing to rent more often nowadays. I sometimes coach my students to use expressions like sadly or to be honest to prompt them to reflect more on their ideas and their answers. let us finish it off.

samples.question: Do you think that will become more common in the future?
samples.transcript: It is quite an interesting question because I have recently heard a lot of stories about people moving out of their countries to experience a different lifestyle. I believe, there are other reasons for people to move to another country to live in. For example, changing jobs or they would like to study in another, another country. I think it is quite interesting to experience a different lifestyle in somewhere that is different from your own country.

samples.question: How do you organize your time?
